meanings.definition: Suitable for membership in a club.
meanings.sent1: She is a clubable person, always eager to join new groups.
meanings.sent2: Only those who meet the criteria are considered clubable for our exclusive club.
meanings.sent3: His friendly nature makes him a clubable addition to any organization.
meanings.sent4: Her sociable personality makes her the most clubable person in our circle of friends.
meanings.sent5: Being approachable and kind is key to being clubable in social settings.

meanings.definition: Able to be formed into a club.
meanings.sent1: The soft clay was clubable, easily molded into various shapes.
meanings.sent2: The flexible material is clubable into different structures.
meanings.sent3: With some creativity, even the most rigid materials can become clubable.
meanings.sent4: The versatile fabric is so clubable that it can be shaped into anything.
meanings.sent5: The playdough is incredibly clubable, allowing children to create endless designs.

meanings.sent1: She is always clubable, ready to participate in any club activity.
meanings.sent2: Being clubable, he never hesitates to sign up for new clubs.
meanings.sent3: Even though he's shy, he's surprisingly clubable when it comes to joining clubs.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm makes her the most clubable person when it comes to club events.
meanings.sent5: His eagerness to socialize makes him incredibly clubable in any club setting.
